comments:
A NullPointerException is thrown when the XML editor window is closed. I don't have the same problem in Windows.
I believe that changing line 532 to line below could fix the fault.

if (fDropAdapter != null && !fDropAdapter.isEmpty() && fDropTarget != null && !fDropTarget.isDisposed() && fDropTarget.getTransfer().length > 0) {

System is Sunblade 1500, Solaris 8, Eclipse 3.1.2 and WTP 1.0.1. See below the error log.
